In England, in the seven days to 17 December, there were 36,963 new confirmed cases (65.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 December, there were 28,691 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 29% (8,272 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 December is 20,392,339 (36,060.6 cases per 100,000 population).
